top10_tweets_like: Y'all, the {tidygeocoder} #rstats package by @JesseCambon makes geocoding addresses *jaw-droppingly* trivial! (h/t @asmae_toumi) (code here: https://t.co/LOv858tCbI) https://t.co/SR8Oy6VVrd

I'm so happy that my submission on humanitarian data science with #rstats was accepted for the next #rstudioconf 
Looking forward to discussing this topic and thanks @Shel_Kariuki
for encouraging me
